lead_paragraph: Almost two dozen civil rights activists were demanding that Mr. Sessions, the Alabama senator, refuse Donald J. Trump’s nomination as attorney general.

headline.main: N.A.A.C.P. President Arrested During Sit-In at Office of Jeff Sessions
headline.print_headline: Arrests as N.A.A.C.P. Has Sit-In at Sessions’s Office
